snippet: At the close of the East Asia Summit, Myanmar’s president, Thein Sein, formally assumed responsibility for hosting the meeting a year from now.
abstract: Myanmar formally accepts top post of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations, affirmation of country’s new position on international stage; Myarmar's Pres Thein Sein assumes responsibility for hosting summit meeting in capital of Naypyidaw in 2014.

byline.contributor: Wai Moe contributed reporting from Yangon, Myanmar.

lead_paragraph: At the close of the East Asia Summit, Myanmar’s president, Thein Sein, formally assumed responsibility for hosting the meeting a year from now.

headline.main: Myanmar in Lead Role at a Regional Meeting
headline.print_headline: Myanmar in Lead Role At a Regional Meeting

keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
keywords.name: glocations
